title: Distress Signal
content:
The bridge lights flash red as your ship, the Odyssey, drifts through deep space. You're three years into a colony mission when the ship's AI, NOVA, wakes you from cryosleep.

"Captain, we've detected a distress signal from the nearby Kepler-442b system. It appears to be human in origin, but our colony mission is already behind schedule. What are your orders?"
tagline: A mysterious distress signal interrupts your colony mission
